price: Nokorε, Yɛabra sε kuro (anaasε nnipa) a Yɛasεe wͻn no, bεnsan aba (wiase) bio.
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
